arts.sum: Scotland midfielders Billy Gilmour and Scott McTominay are expected to start for Napoli against Pisa...

arts.ttl: Matchday 4 concludes with Napoli vs. Pisa
arts.sum: Napoli had not won the first three games of Serie A since the 2021/22 season, when they were on nine points, along with Roma and Milan. Pisa are still looking for a goal from one of their own players in the 2025/26 season: they failed to score in the Coppa Italia in Cesena and in two out of three Serie A games.
